Name: Tomorrow
About the game: ‘Tomorrow’ is a VR experience about how humans have evolved through language over time. It takes us on a mesmerizing journey from prehistoric caves and the Amazonian jungle to the top of the Himalayas. We finally approach ‘Tomorrow’, our next phase of evolution where VR is the new language.
Meta Title: Tomorrow: Feb 8, 2017, Future Lighthouse and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tomorrow? Check out the release date (Feb 8, 2017), developer insights from Future Lighthouse, and a complete game summary.
